Know-your-client (KYC) in fiat->Bitcoin OTC/trading has two purposes: 

- prevent money-laundering and terrorist financing (the law)
- protect $BTC seller from fraudulent chargebacks and scams (internal risk policy)

Decentralized exchanges are chargeback fraudsters' playground!

1064648428934713344.text: This is my favourite time in crypto. 945766674275405829.text: I have so many thoughts about this, especially the question "are humans just not psychologically able to handle a global internet?"https://medium.com/@RickWebb/my-internet-mea-culpa-f3ba77ac3eed …

945774932675489792.text: It is an incredibly complicated problem. It took us millions of years to evolve our society. A mere 20 or 30 years is not going to be enough. But I believe we can solve it.

945774499445780486.text: We need social software that truly understands how society works: the nuance of friends, acquaintances, old flames, crushes, much-loved relatives who drive you nuts, new friends, faded affections, fans, respected colleagues, professional idols.

945772094494736386.text: People often complain that cities are cold and impersonal but this is a feature, not a bug. Cities are survivable only because we found a way to coexist without interacting. The internet needs this feature.

945771737807052800.text: But there's hope in Dunbar, too: cities exist. Humans found a way to live happily in communities far larger than Dunbar.

945771487188996096.text: Dunbar's number is a real and important concept in the design of human communities and we ignore it at our peril. TLDR: humans have trouble interacting in groups later than 100-150.

946184687017439233.text: The more things are forbidden, the more popular they become.

1076592690064695297.text: I used to be a lot more interested in writing and telling stories...and lately, I’m finding myself on the side of doing the work. Building something new from the ground up. Here’s to 2019..

1076591809168592898.text: 2019 will be an exciting year for crypto. New protocols will launch. New layer 2 solutions will be built. Bitcoin in particular will be perfected further.

1076591362840162309.text: The internet continues to evolve. Software keeps eating the world. Blockchain is a logical extension of that, a force out to turn much of this world’s components (like money, but also other things) into purely digital form.

1076590837721649152.text: However, the blockchain companies in this city don’t get nearly the coverage and attention they deserve even as the people persevere through basic pains like getting a bank account, and grapple constantly with regulatory uncertainty.

1076590506166153218.text: It’s been over a year since I’ve blockchained my life. And what a ride this has been. The pace of innovation is simply incredible, and Toronto has a strong position — many great companies are being built here.

1076589856208363527.text: Thinking of my plans and goals for 2019. Should I start writing again?
